text.autoconfig.linkart.title: Linkart
text.autoconfig.linkart.option.enableLin: Whether the Linker item should be enabled or not.
text.autoconfig.linkart.option.enableCha: Whether the Chain item should be enabled or not.
text.autoconfig.linkart.option.pathfindi: The distance within which children will attempt to reach their parents.
text.autoconfig.linkart.option.velocityM: The multiplier of the velocity children will use to reach their parents.
text.autoconfig.linkart.option.collision: The depth of the collision checking children will be subject to.
text.linkart.item.showing_more_parent: Shift + Right-Click to select as parent;
text.linkart.item.showing_more_child: Shift + Right-Click afterwards to select as child;
text.linkart.message.cart_link_success: Cart at [%s, %s, %s] linked as child of [%s, %s, %s]!
text.linkart.message.cart_link_failure_c: Failed to link carts; no chains in inventory!
text.linkart.message.cart_link_failure_d: Failed to link carts; distance too big: over [%s]!
text.linkart.message.cart_link_failure_r: Failed to link cats; cannot recursively link them!
text.linkart.message.cart_link_failure_s: Failed to link carts; cannot link cart with itself!
text.linkart.message.cart_link_failure_d: Failed to link carts on the server; server-side inventory did not contain enough chains!
text.linkart.message.cart_unlink_success: Cart at [%s, %s, %s] unlinked as child of [%s, %s, %s]!
